0.2.name: wordpress/facebook-status-for-wordpress
0.2.description:
Facebook Status for WordPress displays yours latest status in your WordPress blog.

Features

*  Simple
*  Show your status, not much else

Usage

Use the following code to display your status message:

<?php facebook_status("facebook_status_feed_url"); ?>

For more info (how to find your facebook status feeed) visit the plugin homepage.

Customization

None at the moment, just returns your facebook status as plain text.
